Key Match Events: Andries Gous blasted an unbeaten 80 from 47 balls
Quinton de Kock hit five sixes and seven fours in a 40-ball 74
Anrich Nortje conceded just seven runs off the final over to close it out
Pre-Game Insights: USA captain Aaron Jones: 'It's hard to take a defeat after coming so close but we did lack discipline in the bowling, at times.'
Post-Match Reflections: Quinton de Kock: 'We've had some tricky wickets so it was nice to spend sometime in the middle today. The USA put us under pressure towards the end. It was a great game.'
Aidan Markram: 'Pretty happy with the performance as a whole, there were a couple of overs here and there that we need to tidy up.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa survive shock as USA fall just short
USA's highest score in the tournament
South Africa go top of Group 2 in the Super Eights
